alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 3:55PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT THE SHOW LOW AREA IN NAVAJO COUNTY THROUGH 430 PM MST... At 354 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fool Hollow Lake, or near Show Low, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Show Low, White Mountain Lake Estates, Linden, Show Low Airport, Pinetop-Lakeside, and White Mountain Lake. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 332 and 348. State Route 77 between mile markers 343 and 351. Highway 60 between mile markers 338 and 348. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; White Mountains
